text:
Producer-san!
Could I ask you to check the photos?

(One with the members of Houkura,
and... a selfie of just Chiyoko...)

Yeah, looks good.
...By the way, if it's alright, I have a suggestion.

How about a full-body shot?
I'll take it for you.

! Right, we need photos where the costumes are clearly
visible, don't we...! Thank you very much...!
Oh, no, that's not it but...
I thought your family might want to see them too.
